mapper.update: update t_order set order_status=1,pay_time=now() where order_id=#{orderId}
update t_order set order_status=5,finish_time=now() where order_id=#{orderId}
update t_order set order_status=#{orderStatus} where order_id=#{orderId}
mapper.select: select order_id,user_id,seller_id,product_id,order_status,total_amount,create_time from t_order where order_status=0 and now()>=create_time+ interval 15 minute order by order_id asc limit 50
select order_id from t_order where order_status=0 and now()>=create_time+ interval 15 minute order by order_id asc limit 50

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN order_status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS UnpaidOrderNumber, SUM(CASE WHEN order_status in (1,2) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS WaitingForDeliveryOrderNumber, SUM(CASE WHEN order_status = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS WaitingForReceiptOrderNumber, SUM(CASE WHEN order_status = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CompletedOrderNumber, SUM(CASE WHEN order_status = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CanceledOrderNumber FROM t_order WHERE user_id = #{userId}

select order_id,user_id,order_status,total_amount,create_time,pay_time,delivery_time,finish_time from t_order where user_id=#{userId}
and order_status=0
and (order_status=1 or order_status=2)
and order_status=3
and order_status=4
and order_status=5
order by create_time desc
